forgot.subject: Password Reset
forgot.message:
You are receiving this email because you have forgotten your password, and a token has been generated to reset it. 
Click the following link: {{verification_link}} to reset your password. 

 Note: If you did not request this, please contact administration immediately as your account may be at risk.
forgot.screen_message: We have just sent you an email to reset your password. Please check your inbox.
